hero.title: Hologram
hero.subtitle: Unified Virtual Infrastructure for Scalable AI
hero.vision: We believe the future of AI requires rethinking how computation scales.
hero.mission: Make every processor act like a supercomputer through virtual acceleration.
hero.description: A virtual hypervisor and compiler runtime that sits beneath existing frameworks, automatically optimizing AI compute workloads. Enabling 3x throughput at 1/3 energy with zero code or hardware changes.

features.title: Portable and Composable

features.title: General Purpose In-Memory Compute

features.title: Virtual Hardware-Agnostic Runtime
